nodes.text: Clan Sharratt was a Mandalorian clan consisting of humans, Zabrak, and were lead by Kaleesh Warlords. Their existence was around the time of the Cold War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the Cold War, Clan Sharratt was testing a new Imperial combat adrenal and issued a challenge for the Republic defenders: come face them in combat, or the Mandalorians would begin destroying random Republic property on Nar Shaddaa. However, they were defeated, their enclave destroyed, and their leader Kassor Quade was killed.
Clan Sharratt and its chieftain are the main antagonists of the mission [HEROIC 4] Mandalorian Rage, only playable for Republic factions in Star Wars: The Old Republic.
